g:
<polygon points="0 <%= section_height %> <%= section_width %> <%= section_height %> <%= section_width %> 0" fill="<%= window_fill_color %>" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="<%= frame_thickness -1 %>" stroke-linejoin="miter">
<polyline points="0 <%= section_height %> <%= section_width %> <%= section_height %> <%= section_width %> 0 0 <%= section_height %> " fill="none" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.5" stroke-linejoin="miter" />
